com.engine.graphics

Class ScreenHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engine.graphics.ScreenHandler

  • public class ScreenHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    ScreenHandler

    ScreenHandler handles all of a project's screens. A screen can be shown or unloaded through this class.

    Author:
    Ryan Hochmuth

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScreenHandler(Core core)
      Create a new ScreenHandler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Core getCore()
      Get the Core.
      Screen getCurrentScreen()
      Get the currently shown Screen.
      Screen getScreenOnDeck() 
      void setCurrentScreen(Screen screen)
      Set the current screen.
      void setProjectLoading(boolean projectLoading)
      Set the boolean flag projectLoading depending on if the project is loading or not.
      void setScreenOnDeck(Screen screen)
      Set the next screen to show.
      void showScreen(Screen currentScreen)
      If the project is loaded, this method sets the given currentScreen as the project's current Screen and runs it's onCreate method to show it.
      void unloadCurrentScreen()
      Unload the screen that is currently shown.
      void update()
      NOT USED A general update method.
